'''0.28''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on October 27, 2009, at 13:19 UTC.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: (13:19:11) <Notch> ok, client update coming up</ref> It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 14:04 UTC<ref>[[wordofnotch:224775024|"The skinny on the creative mode update"]] – The Word of Notch, October 27, 2009</ref> 

== Additions ==
{{Additions table|Obsidian}}

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Obsidian JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Obsidian]]'''
* Extremely tough to break.
* Drops 1 [[cobblestone]] when mined.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:White Sheep JE1.png|32px]] [[Sheep]]'''
* Drop 1–3 [[cloth]] when hit.
* Drop 0–2 brown [[mushroom]]s when killed.
* Reward the player with 10 points when killed.
* They eat grass to regrow wool on their bodies, reverting [[grass block]] to [[dirt]].
* Are only available in Survival mode, which is disabled in this version.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Creative]] mode'''
* Re-added [[Creative]] mode.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Cloth]]'''
* Changed the texture of dark gray cloth from [[File:Dark Gray Cloth JE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Dark Gray Cloth JE2.png|32px]].
* Changed the texture of light gray cloth from [[File:Light Gray Cloth JE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Light Gray Cloth JE2.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Lava JE6.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Lava JE7.png|32px]].
* Now displays in the [[hotbar]].

'''[[File:Water JE4.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Water JE5.png|32px]].
* Now displays in the [[hotbar]].

'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:TNT JE1.png|32px]].

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:Steve JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Player]]s'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Steve JE2.png|25px]], removing the beard and second layer of hair.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Controls]]'''
* The hotbar no longer saves when a new level is generated.
* Creative mode controls changes:
** Pick-block now works.
** Attack speed is no longer limited.
** Reach increased back to 5 blocks.
* Arrow counter is hidden in Creative mode.

'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Now works again.
* When the player stands near/inside another player, it pushes the player away slightly.
** It is possible to walk through a player, but it feels slightly "solid".

'''[[Creative]] mode'''
* Added ores, stone slabs, iron blocks, bricks, bookshelves, mossy cobblestone, and TNT to the creative inventory.

'''[[Survival]] mode'''
* Only available through modding the client.
* Only sheep spawn.
** Other mobs can still exist and still function as normal.
* TNT disappears upon detonation.
* Blocks do not drop items (although [[sheep]] still do).

=== General ===
'''[[Menu screen]]s'''
* Re-added menu and death screen shading.

== Technical==
=== General ===
'''Performance'''
* Higher FPS and less chunk updates.

'''World generation'''
* Altered the level saving/loading code.

'''Rendering'''
* The rendering engine now supports 2 layers of transparency.{{verify}}

'''[[Game mode]]'''
* Game modes are now changed via a line in <code>Minecraft.class</code>.

== Fixes ==
'''6 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed exploit where someone logging in with an illegal name would cause players to disconnect.

'''From 0.24 SURVIVAL TEST'''
* Looking at glass now makes glass textures directly behind it disappear once again.{{verify|type=untestable|edition=java}}

'''From 0.26 SURVIVAL TEST'''
* Slabs can be placed under slabs without them collapsing into a full block. (Still can't be placed on top though)
* Top slab texture is no longer invisible if there is a block directly above. 
* Placing a block on a slab no longer causes it to become a double-slab.

'''From 0.27 SURVIVAL TEST'''
* Water and lava no longer display parts of other textures.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* This version has a bug that allowed players to kill others in creative mode.
